panels.title: TCP Sockets reciev queue length by limit (percent)
TCP Sockets reciev queue length by limit

targets.legendFormat: {{ instance }} - rate of writes per second

panels.description: the average time (in milliseconds) for I/O requests issued to the device to be served
panels.title: disk device await

targets.expr: (sum by (instance, dev) (rate(disk_io_await{instance=~"$server", type="read"}[$interval])) / sum by (instance, dev) (rate(disk_io{instance=~"$server", type="transfers_read"}[$interval])) ) / 1000
(sum by (instance, dev) (rate(disk_io_await{instance=~"$server", type="write"}[$interval])) / sum by (instance, dev) (rate(disk_io{instance=~"$server", type="transfers_write"}[$interval])) ) / 1000
sum by (node, zone, size, instance) (buddyinfo_count {instance=~"$server", zone="Normal" }) > 1000
